version_description:
- Improved the problem when watching video ads. 
- Enabled to skip the opening and result screen. 
- Improved data corruption to occur. 
- Improved some display and layout.

- Added new fossils 
- Added new floors and stands
- Increased the level limit for attracting customers and the number of excavations
- Added the function of selling fossils
- Billing including Remove Ads 
- Modified the appearance condition of the dig point on the map
(At the time of stands creation or at the time of fossils complete)
- You can move by dragging on the museum screen
- You can play while playing music 
- Earn rewards while returning to home from the app
- Other, layout improvement, specification adjustment, etc.

- Added new fossils 
- Added new floors and stands
- Increased the level limit for attracting customers and the number of excavations
- Added the function of selling fossils
- Billing including Remove Ads 
- Modified the appearance condition of the dig point on the map
- You can move by dragging on the museum screen
- You can play while playing music 
- Earn rewards while returning to home from the app
- Improved the layout (v1.1.1)
- Other, layout improvement, specification adjustment, etc.

- The contents of “STARTER PACK” has been changed. It removes the all ads.
- Added a Collection book.
- Changed the fossil name to be displayed according to the complete rate.
- Other, layout improvement, specification adjustment, etc.

- Fixed a bug related to saving data.
- Improved performance.
- Fixed a bug when calling the bus on the right floor.
- Improved to include one new bone when excavating.

- Added new fossils 
- Added new floors and stands
- Added items “Bus Ticket”, “Stamina Drink”, “Fuel (Bullldozer)” and “Fossil Detector”
- Added In App Purchase “VALUE PACK” and “TRIAL PACK”
- Added Cleaner that can automatically collect coins
- Added a roulette for items as a rare reward for watching videos
- Increased the level limit for attracting customer, the number of excavations and Pickaxe
- You can browse the map
- Added hints when discovering fossil pieces
- Other, layout improvement, specification adjustment, etc.

- Improved performance, and added LOW mode
- Fixed various bugs

- Added new fossils, floors and stands
- Added items “Bus Ticket”, “Stamina Drink”, “Fuel” and “Fossil Detector”
- Added In App Purchase “VALUE PACK” and “TRIAL PACK”
- Added Cleaner that can automatically collect coins
- Added a roulette for items as a rare reward for watching videos
- Increased the level limit for attracting customer, the number of excavations and Pickaxe
- Layout improvement, specification adjustment, etc

- Fixed a bug that didn't start from the black screen.
- Other problems and improvements.

- Added 12 new fossils
- Added new rooms and stands
- Increased the level limit for attracting customer, the number of excavations and Pickaxe
- Added the ability to dig with double stamina
- Reduced the forced full screen ads a little
- Changed to reward the button while closing the app (with online)
- Passers were strengthened
- Improved overall performance
- Other, design changes, layout improvements, specification adjustments, etc.

- Added 12 new fossils
- Added new rooms and stands
- Increased the level limit for attracting customer, the number of excavations and Pickaxe
- Added the ability to dig with double stamina
- Reduced the forced full screen ads a little
- Changed to reward the button while closing the app (with online)
- Passers were strengthened
- Improved overall performance
- Other, design changes, layout improvements, specification adjustments, etc.

---
- Fixed bugs in v1.3.0
- Displayed the classification on the status screen

- Data can be migrated when the device changes.
- Enabled to switch languages.
- Chinese (simplified and traditional) and Korean fossil names are displayed.
- Minimaps are displayed in museum.
- Roulette specifications have been enhanced to make it easier to get items.
  - The ads will not be deleted at “STARTER PACK", because the roulette are equivalent to billing.
- Improved and adjusted the design and fonts.
- Adjusted the specifications.

- Data can be migrated when the device changes.
- Enabled to switch languages.
- Chinese (simplified and traditional) and Korean fossil names are displayed.
- Roulette specifications have been enhanced to make it easier to get items.
  - The ads will not be deleted at “STARTER PACK", because the roulette are equivalent to billing.
- Improved and adjusted the design and fonts.
- Fixed display problems on the selection dialog. (v1.3.3)

The next big update is scheduled for March.

- Added 10 new fossils
- Added new rooms and stands
- Increased the level limit for attracting customer, the number of excavations and Pickaxe
- Added a new currency “GEMS”
- The items “Fossil Container” and “Super Light” have been added
- The items can be enhanced
- The layout of the room can be changed
- The lighting colors of rooms and fossils can be changed
- The roulette content has been strengthened a bit
- The fossil pieces occurrence rate has been improved
- Other, design changes, layout improvements, specification adjustments, etc.

- Improved performance.
- Fixed a bug that caused the game to end when watching an excavation video.
- You can now disable freed cleaners.
- You can now skip the bus.
- Light orange and yellow-green colors have been added to match the classification colors.
- Other design revisions and improvements were made.

- Improved performance.
- Fixed a bug that caused the game to end when watching an excavation video.
- You can now disable freed cleaners.
- You can now skip the bus.
- Light orange and yellow-green colors have been added to match the classification colors.
- Other design revisions and improvements were made.

- Added 15 new fossils
- Added new rooms and stands
- Increased the level limit for attracting customer, the number of excavations and Tools
- Added a shop where you can buy excavation tools
- Added the ability to dig with triple stamina (With Stamina LV.20 or higher)
- Stand for small items has been added
(If the layout of the room on the 1F right side has not been changed, there is a specification change that one stand is replaced with a stand for small items.)
- Added stand for pterosauria
- Some fossils float on chains.
- When changing the layout, the left and right directions of fossils can be changed.
- Fossils favorite feature was added.
- Stands and a classification sticky notes have been added to the collection.
- Other, design changes, layout improvements, specification adjustments, etc.

- Improved performance.
- Added loading screen.
- Fixed bugs.

- Added 12 new fossils
- Added new rooms and stands
- Increased the level limit for attracting customer, the number of excavations and Tools
- The latest research on Spinosaurus is now supported.
- Changed the display when the excavation rate is 200%.
- Added the geological period in the picture book.
- Added the ability to switch the vibration.
- Other, design changes, layout improvements, specification adjustments, etc.

- Bug fix.
---
- Added 12 new fossils
- Added new rooms and stands
- Increased the level limit for attracting customer, the number of excavations and Tools
- The latest research on Spinosaurus is now supported.
- Changed the display when the excavation rate is 200%.
- Added the geological period in the picture book.

[v1.6.3]
- Bug fix.

---
- Added 12 new fossils
- Added new rooms and stands
- Increased the level limit for attracting customer, the number of excavations and Tools
- The latest research on Spinosaurus is now supported.
- Changed the display when the excavation rate is 200%.
- Added the geological period in the picture book.
- Added the ability to switch the vibration.
- Other, design changes, layout improvements, specification adjustments, etc.

- Added 12 new fossils
- Added new rooms and stands
- Increased the level limit for attracting customer, the number of excavations and Tools
- Enhanced the screenshot function
   - Panorama function to capture multiple rooms
   - Switch between displaying visitors and coins
- Localization support has been added
　Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Russian
- Other, design changes, layout improvements, specification adjustments, etc.

- Due to the difficulty in classifying Herrerasaurus, it has been changed from "theropod" to "other".
- Fixed a bug related to screen shots.
- Other internal fixes and improvements.

- Changed the Korean title and revised the localization.
- Some dots of Gigantoraptor have been adjusted.
- Corrected some parts of the localization.
- Minor bug fixes, improvements, etc.
